title: Inkscapetober Day 18: Moon
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 18:** Moon
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image coldnights.png]]


**Subject:** cold_Nights

**Commentary:** A rather simple one now. The coat of arms presented here purely describe cold_Nights's name and not really more. I had to think a bit about how to depict the cold part, and eventually I settled on the use of a thermometer. The supporters are wild men frequently used in German heraldry. In addition to that they are both [[[Nature | M and Nature]]].

**How the prompt fits in:** It's night, so there has got to be a moon. Even better, since we are talking about cold_Nights, so plural, I decided to add two.

@@ @@
